tool_description: Analyzes transaction patterns and user behavior to detect potentially fraudulent activities using machine learning models and rule-based systems.

device_fingerprint.description: Device fingerprint for device-based fraud detection

transaction_frequency.description: Number of recent transactions by this user

payment_method_age.description: Age of payment method in days since first use

merchant_category.description: Merchant category code or business type

previous_declined_attempts.description: Number of recent declined payment attempts

account_age_days.description: Age of user account in days

velocity_check_hours.description: Time window in hours for velocity checking

error_messages: Invalid transaction amount: Must be a positive number.
Missing user data: User ID and device fingerprint are required for analysis.
Invalid location data: Location data format is not recognized.
Invalid timestamp format: Use ISO 8601 format for time_of_transaction.
Transaction frequency out of range: Must be between 0 and 1000.
Invalid risk tolerance: Use low, medium, or high.
Velocity check hours invalid: Must be between 1 and 168 hours.
usage: Provide all required transaction and user data parameters. Optionally specify previous_declined_attempts, account_age_days, velocity_check_hours, and risk_tolerance. Returns fraud risk assessment and recommended actions.

fraud_score.description: Fraud risk score from 0-100 (higher indicates more risk)

risk_level.description: Risk level classification (low, medium, high, critical)

triggered_rules.description: List of fraud detection rules that were triggered

confidence_score.description: Confidence level of the fraud assessment (0-100)
